content.title: Uses
content.description: Fruit kernel is edible. Main trunk is used for house construction.  Leaves are used for thatching. Coconut has many useful products: tender coconut water, copra, coconut oil, raw kernel, coconut cake, coconut toddy, coconut shell and wood-based products, coconut leaves, coir pith etc. Coconut kernel and tender coconut water have microminerals and nutrients, and also have numerous medicinal properties such as antibacterial, antifungal, antiviral, antiparasitic, antidermatophytic, antioxidant, hypoglycaemic, hepatoprotective, immunostimulant. Coconut is used as food by the people almost worldwide.
